Class DocumentWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.px100systems.data.plugin.storage.mongo.DocumentWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalWriter

    public class DocumentWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExternalWriter
    Mongo Document serializer. Used internally by MongoDatabaseStorage to serialize beans through SerializationDefinition
    Author:
    Alex Rogachevsky
